handler.description: Custom function that should be called on click on node. Recieve node as parameter

noTick.description: When using tick strategy, should node display checkbox?

tickStrategy.description: Override global tick strategy for this node only

examples.leaf: Ticked nodes are only the leaves. Ticking a node influences the parentâ€™s ticked state too (parent becomes partially ticked or ticked), as well as its children (all tickable children become ticked).

examples.leaf-filtered: Same concept as leaf, only that this strategy applies only to filtered nodes (the nodes that remain visible after filtering).

examples.strict: Ticked nodes are independent of parent or children tick state.

lazy.description: Should children be lazy loaded? In this case also don't specify 'children' prop

header.description: Node header scoped slot name, w/o the required 'header-' prefix. Ex 'story' refers to 'header-story' scoped slot

body.description: Node body scoped slot name, w/o the required 'body-' prefix. Ex 'story' refers to 'body-story' scoped slot
